climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 👉【Large Storage Capacity Desk with Drawers】This desk table is designed with 3 easy to assemble fabric drawers that give a nice amount of storage for everything else you need during your work day or study day. The 3 storage drawers can stash things away. Perfect for placing your documents, office or school supplies, gaming equipment etc. You will always have an organized desktop after owing it.

👉【Computer Desk with Storage Shelves】This desk with storage allows for an ample storage space, giving you a cleaner looking desk top, besides the desk shelves is removable, it can serve as a 2 tiers bookshelf, but also as a organizer. Both of two sides meet for your different storage needs in home or office. Having the work- from-home desk for your happy life.

👉【All-in-one Versatility Computer Desk】The perfect desktop size (47.3 inch*15.7inch) fits your laptop, books and 3 large capacity fabric drawers (each drawer can support up to 8 lb, about 2 laptops). Ample room for all of your office or work- from-home needs! The detachable underneath storage shelves of the desk can be placed in any size so it works perfect for any usage. (Eg: books, organizer.) There are also a lot more legroom and space for you.

👉【Sturdy & Attractive Desk Table】The metal leg and wood desktop together makes this desk a tank in the desk world. This construction design keep your table be no wobble while typing, writing or gaming. Even serving as your office desk, study writing table, gaming desk. The industrial desk design also match the rest of your furniture. You can enjoy sturdy and fashion design all in one desk.

👉【Easy Assembly & After-sale Service】The desk come with detailed instructions, all parts are clearly labeled, what you need to do is following instructions step-by-step. If your ODK desk arrives damaged, missing part or scratched, please feel free to contact us, our professional customer support team will help you solve the problem within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great desk.
reviews.reviewText: I needed two of these desks, but I ordered only one to start with to see what it was like. After receiving this desk and putting it together I was so pleased with it that I placed an order for the second desk.Before buying this desk I checked at some office stores for "inexpensive desks", and the prices in these stores was considerably higher and lesser quality than this desk is. I was concerned about the fabric drawers this desk has, because when I saw the fabric drawers in the desks in the office store, they were flimsy and horrible. But these drawers, even though they are fabric, are quite sturdy.The desk was very easy to assemble, all the parts were there (including extras). It looks nice, is lightweight (easy to move around), and will meet my needs as a laptop desk. By the way, some reviews on this desk complained that it's not as big as they thought it would. Since the measurements are included in the product description, and the measurements are accurate, I have a hard time understanding why they thought it would be bigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As advertised, but feels smaller
reviews.reviewText: The Dimensions are accurate, but it feels smaller. If you saw it at the store you would pass on it because it seems small and flimsy, but works as advertised. The fabric drawers are a shock but they work and are mentioned in the description. The metal frame looks weak, but is surprisingly solid. Very easy assembly. I only have a small area to put a desk and it fits perfectly. Would make a great student desk. Would make a good bill pay desk. The top is thinner than expected, but overall for the price, I am happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty decent, but bent on arrival
reviews.reviewText: I am giving this a 4 because it is sturdy, looks nice and fits my need. However, I was disappointed to open the box and find that part of the frame was bent pretty badly. The only reason I didn't return it is because it is the part above the drawers and does not effect the use and stability. All in all not too bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY to put together
reviews.reviewText: RAVE for this product. was super easy to put together and was super sturdy. Perfect little desk for my 10 year olds room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little desk
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together, it even came with gloves for people who where worried about cutting themselves on the pipes. I didn't use them, they were not sharp.The drawers are bigger then I thought they would be(gonna need drawer organizers).The slide very easily in and out despite being cloth.The bottom shelf as a perfect hight for my pc tower saving room on top of the desk.Wish the width was wider but that is on me for not measuring how big I needed. And it works for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smaller but still has a lot of storage
reviews.reviewText: This desk is exactly what I wanted! Very easy assembly. Maybe took me 45 minutes. It’s lightweight but sturdy. I’m using it as a vanity and the drawers and shelves are perfect for all my makeup and hair products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not enough screws
reviews.reviewText: The desk is pretty and seems like it would be very sturdy, but there are not enough screws to put this mf together. Pretty frustrating

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have to admit I was a little skeptical about ordering a desk with cloth drawers…..but I’m so glad I got it. It fits perfectly where I needed it to go, and I have to say that it is a great looking piece of furniture. I’m not sure how long it will hold up, I hope for a very long time as the framing is metal. It is an attractive piece and low profile. You won’t be disappointed
I love it, it works good in my space, and serves the purpose for what I am using it for.
I wish the bottom shelves were a little big bigger to fit my printer. But i guess they are mostly for decorations, flowers and stuff

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Desk, Instructions we a little basuc
reviews.reviewText: This product works great for working from home 1 day a week. I find the draws a little flimsy and wasn't able to put the back cross bar on as the instructions weren't that great!
I really do like this desk it’s small it fit great into my room and very sleek and simple with lots of storage space in the drawers
